TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit LinePragmaCodeInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains properties for a script block being parsed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks During page parsing, information about a script block is stored in the <xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> class. This class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.SimpleWebHandlerParser> class.
<xref:System.Web.Compilation.LinePragmaCodeInfo> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
